titles.title: Eruptive Products of Klyuchevskoy (and Kamchatka Region) Volcano(es) from 1937-1938, Russia

rightsList.rights: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States [CC BY-NC-SA 3.0]

descriptions.description: This dataset is a summary of fumarole gas analyses from Kamchatka region volcanoes from 1937-1938. Analyses of trace elements and trace compounds are without quantitative analyses and reported as detects only. Fumarole gas samples are from Klyuchevskoy craters, in addition to one sample from: Tolbachik, Shiveluch, and Avachinsky volcanoes.
volatiles, volcanic gas, fumarole gas, volcanoes

geoLocation.geoLocationPlace: Russia, Kamchatka, Klyuchevskoy, Klyuchevskaya, Klyuchev Crater, Tuyla crater, Biloikai Crater, Glaoily crater, Shiveluch Volcano, Tolbachik Vlcano
